channel.title: climate change on Suburb Zero ACT
channel.description: Recent content in climate change on Suburb Zero ACT

item.title: why?
item.description: We need to decarbonise quickly. The intensity and number of floods and fires in Australia is on line with predictions from past climate models from the CSIRO and IPCC. A lot of dedicated clever people have strived for decades on the science of climate change. These models have been constantly refined and tested against reality. “It is unequivocal that human influence has warmed the atmosphere, ocean and land” – IPCC Sixth Assessment Report
